Title: Highlight multiple regions (SPIN states) and OMERO track
Caption: An illustration of using scater plot tool and context-mode navigation style to explore the putative speckle-speckle interaction in K562. SPIN states is based on Wang et al. 2020 (bioRxiv, doi: https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.03.09.982967). Subcompartments calls are from Xiong and Ma 2019 (doi: 10.1038/s41467-019-12954-4).
Author: Yang Zhang (CMU)
